data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Every single respondent in customer discovery conveyed positive reactions to the idea demonstrating that the event can breed wider interest into tennis. This ____ without ____ current ____ fans ____ will ____ the ____ because ____ key ____ of ____ sport ____ terms ____ how ____ is ____ are ____. A key finding from customer study is that basic principles of tennis are widely understood in the western world because of the publicity and media attention given to the Grand Slams tournaments which are often the only times people tune in to watch the sport.
data.partBlankContent: Every single respondent in customer discovery conveyed positive reactions to the idea demonstrating that the event can breed wider interest into tennis. This i_ without displ_____ current ten___ fans w__ will con____ the ev___ because t__ key fundam______ of t__ sport i_ terms o_ how i_ is pla___ are maint_____. A key finding from customer study is that basic principles of tennis are widely understood in the western world because of the publicity and media attention given to the Grand Slams tournaments which are often the only times people tune in to watch the sport.
data.answer: 每一个在客户发现方面的受访者都对这个想法表达了积极的反应，这表明这项活动可以培养更广泛的对网球的兴趣。这并没有取代现在的网球迷，他们将消费这项赛事，因为这项运动的关键基础是如何进行的条款得到维护。客户研究的一个关键发现是，网球的基本原理在西方世界得到了广泛理解，因为人们对大满贯赛事的宣传和媒体关注往往是人们观看这项运动的唯一时间。
